overview: Maya goes to a meeting with ex-boyfriend Zemo, who took her rightful time. She needs to say goodbye to this guy, because she has a new relationship. The meeting takes place in the park. In parallel, Maya writes her new love, which is already impatient to Maya belonged only to him. Maya, like a real woman, has to make a difficult choice between Summer and Winter. She's just in love Spring.
title: Spring, come!
